entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wabush Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -34.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
